Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['*Five years after suffering a crushing defeat and staggering losses at the hands of the evil Thanos (Josh Brolin in a motion-capture performance), Iron Man (Robert Downey, Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), and the rest of the remaining Avengers join forces with allies new and old as they travel back in time to various points in the past in a desperate attempt to obtain the powerful Infinity Stones and put things right. Thrilling, critically acclaimed, blockbuster sequel also stars Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner. Two-disc set. *Genre: Action & Adventure *Rated PG-13']

reference_summary:
Dumbo
Herman Bing  (Actor),     Edward Brophy  (Actor),     Ben Sharpsteen  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    G    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
["Let your spirits soar as you travel beyond the big top to Walt Disney's timeless classic! In celebration of this landmark film's 70th anniversary,", 'Dumbo', 'now includes a thrilling digital restoration and never-before-seen bonus features! When Mrs. Jumbo\'s little "Baby Mine" finally arrives, Dumbo and his oversized ears become the talk of the circus. With the help of his loyal best friend, Timothy Mouse, a magic feather and a ton of courage, Dumbo uses his sensational ears to soar to fame as the world\'s one and only flying elephant! Full of daring adventure, memorable characters, award-winning music and inspiring messages about the power of friendship and belief in yourself,', 'Dumbo', "will become a treasured part of your family's collection of classic movies."]

The Secret Life of Pets [DVD]
Louis C.K.  (Actor),     Eric Stonestreet  (Actor),     Chris Renaud  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
['Comedy superstars Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, and Kevin Hart make their animated feature-film debut that finally answers the question: what do your pets do when you\'re not home? When their owners leave for the day, pets from the building gossip with their friends, satisfy their sweet tooths, and throw outrageous parties. But when a pampered terrier (C.K.) and his unruly new "roommate" from the pound (Stonestreet) get lost in the urban jungle of New York City, they must put aside their differences to survive the epic journey back home.', 'Bonus Content:', 'The Humans That Brought You Pets', 'The Humans That Brought You Pets', 'Animals Can Talk: Meet the Actors', 'Animals Can Talk: Meet the Actors', 'All About the Pets', 'All About the Pets', 'Hairstylist to the Dogs', 'Hairstylist to the Dogs', 'The Best of Snowball', 'The Best of Snowball', '"Lovely Day" Lyric Video', '"Lovely Day" Lyric Video', 'Hot Dog Sing-Along', 'Hot Dog Sing-Along', 'Brian the Minion on Pets', 'Brian the Minion on Pets', 'Go-Pro: The Secret Life of Pets', 'Go-Pro: The Secret Life of Pets', 'Sing Trailer', 'Sing Trailer', 'Mini-Movies.', 'Mini-Movies.']

The Secret Life of Pets 2 [DVD]
Kevin Hart  (Actor),     Harrison Ford  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
["The Secret Life of Pets 2 continues the story of Max (Patton Oswalt), Gidget (Jenny Slate), Snowball (Kevin Hart) and the rest of the gang as they take on new adventures and are pushed to find the courage to become their own heroes. Explore the emotional lives of our pets—the deep bond between them, the families that love them—and find out what your pets are really doing when you're not at home.", 'Bonus Content:', 'Mini-Movies', 'Mini-Movies', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies', 'Deleted Scenes', 'Deleted Scenes', 'A Tapestry of a Tail - The Making of', 'A Tapestry of a Tail - The Making of', 'How to Draw', 'How to Draw', 'Frame by Frame - How to Make a Flip Book', 'Frame by Frame - How to Make a Flip Book', 'Character Pods', 'Character Pods', 'The Further Adventures of Captain Snowball', 'The Further Adventures of Captain Snowball', 'A Party Fit for a Pet', 'A Party Fit for a Pet', "Pops' Puppy Training School with Kevin Hart", "Pops' Puppy Training School with Kevin Hart", "Pet's Yule Log", "Pet's Yule Log", 'Lyric Videos', 'Lyric Videos', ']]>']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user maintains a strong preference for classic animated films, particularly from Disney, but has also shown interest in popular action-packed features, showcasing a broadened appreciation for various genres. A growing enthusiasm for family-oriented animated comedies remains evident, focusing on content that resonates with young audiences.
- **Target Audience**: Continues to prioritize children-friendly content, ensuring films remain engaging and accessible for youngsters, while occasionally exploring titles that appeal to a wider family demographic.
- **Content Type**: Favors physical media formats like DVDs, valuing tangible collections while incorporating both classic animated films and notable contemporary action titles into their library.
- **Review Positivity**: A consistently positive reviewer, highlighted by numerous high ratings and enthusiastic recommendations for family-friendly and newly discovered action movies, reflecting an ongoing engagement with uplifting narratives and thrilling experiences.
- **Family Orientation**: Cherishes shared viewing experiences with family, particularly granddaughters, emphasizing the importance of creating joyful moments through diverse entertaining content.
- **Emotional Connection**: Seeks films that promote themes of friendship, courage, and inspiration, valuing narratives that resonate with children and families, whether they are animated or live-action.
- **Frequency**: Balances revisiting beloved classics with exploring newer titles across various genres, confirming a commitment to quality content, enriching family moments filled with laughter and excitement.
